test.name: User must sign in to check out

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Set Focus To Element
kw.doc: Sets the focus to the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'vertical laptop mount' into text field 'id=twotabsearchtextbox'.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.msg: ElementNotInteractableException: Message: Element cannot be interacted with via the keyboard because it is not focusable

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Image
kw.doc: Clicks an image identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Sign in to check out Test Case
